HotelElement.Name: Fergus Style Cala Blanca Suites (Formerly D'or Jardin de Playa)

Address.Address1: HUGUER D'ES FAR, 27 - URB. ES CASTELLOT 27

Description.Text: This 166 room Majorcan apartment complex is comfortable and well equipped with air conditioned rooms, satellite television, balconies and kitchenettes. Guests arrive into a welcoming 24 hour reception and can enjoy indoor and outdoor swimming facilities, a weekly evening entertainment programme, an air conditioned restaurant, a bar and a cafe.

The three-star D'Or Jardin de Playa Aparthotel is in a great location overlooking the bay of Santa Ponsa. The apartments are in a quieter area on the edge of the Santa Ponsa resort in Majorca away from the bustling centre and its shops, bars and restaurants but still within easy reach of its amenities and nightlife.The quieter location attracts families looking for a relaxed holiday in Majorca. Everything Santa Ponsa has to offer is within walking distance, there is a small beach close to the Jardin de Playa Aparthotel and a larger beach in the centre of town.
